title: Prepare the guanciale
definition: Remove the skin from the guanciale, slice it into 1 cm slices, and chop into 0.5 cm chunks. Cook in a cold pan over medium-high heat to render the fat and get it golden.
explanation: The guanciale needs to be prepared and cooked to render out the fat, which is a key component of the carbonara sauce.

title: Prepare the pepper
definition: Crack black peppercorns in a pestle and mortar, then sift to separate the outer skin from the hotter interior.
explanation: Preparing the pepper ensures you use the hotter interior, which is essential for the flavor of the dish.

title: Grate the cheese
explanation: Grating the cheese is necessary to prepare the cheese mixture that will be used in the sauce.

title: Prepare the egg and cheese mixture
definition: Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk them with grated pecorino romano cheese to form a mixture.
explanation: The egg and cheese mixture forms the base of the sauce for the carbonara.

title: Boil the pasta
definition: Cook the pasta in lightly salted boiling water until al dente, twisting it as it goes into the water to prevent sticking.
explanation: Boiling the pasta is a crucial step as it is the main component of the dish.

title: Combine pasta with guanciale
definition: Once the guanciale is golden, remove garlic, and add the cooked pasta directly to the pan with some pasta water to stop frying and emulsify with the fat.
explanation: Combining the pasta with the guanciale and its rendered fat allows the flavors to infuse into the pasta.

title: Mix pasta with egg and cheese sauce
definition: Add the egg and cheese mixture to the hot pasta and toss to create a creamy sauce without scrambling the eggs, adding more pasta water as needed.
dependencies: Prepare the egg and cheese mixture
explanation: The heat from the pasta cooks the egg mixture gently, creating a creamy sauce.

title: Adjust sauce consistency and garnish
definition: Add more pasta water if needed to achieve the desired sauce consistency. Finish with additional pecorino cheese and cracked pepper.
dependencies: Mix pasta with egg and cheese sauce
explanation: Adjusting the sauce consistency ensures it is creamy and coats the pasta well, while garnishing enhances flavor and presentation.
